home.firstParagraph: My name is Antti-Pekka Haarala and I am a developer based in Tampere
home.secondParagraph: I'm a 4th year Software Engineering student in Tampere University of Applied Sciences. I am simultaneously working as a backend developer using technologies such as TypeScript and Azure
home.thirdParagraph: I am writing my thesis about Functional programming and Object-oriented programming in TypeScript
